Name: Kongzhong Corp
Description: KongZhong Corporation provides digital entertainment services for consumers in the People?s Republic of China and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Internet Games, Mobile Games, and Wireless Value-Added Services (WVAS). The Internet Games segment operates various licensed Internet games, including World of Tanks, World of Warplanes, and Guild Wars 2 games. It also develops and licenses various Internet games, such as Master of Meteor Blades based on its proprietary game engine and game development platforms technologies for another Internet game operator. The Mobile Games segment develops and publishes mobile games, including action, role-playing, and leisure games for mobile phone users. The WVAS segment provides interactive entertainment, media, and other interactive services to mobile phone users. This segment offers mobile games, pictures, karaoke, electronic books, mobile phone personalization features, entertainment news, chat, and message boards. The company also offers support and technical services. KongZhong Corporation sells its WVAS and mobile games primarily through telecommunication operators, as well as other distribution partners. The company was formerly known as Communication Over The Air Inc. and changed its name to KongZhong Corporation in March 2004. KongZhong Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People?s Republic of China.
